title: Phishers Target Aviation Execs to Scam Customers
summary: KrebsOnSecurity recently heard from a reader whose boss's email account got phished and was used to trick one of the company's customers into sending a large payment to scammers. An investigation into the attacker's infrastructure points to a long-running Nigerian cybercrime...
fullContent: KrebsOnSecurity recently heard from a reader whose boss‚Äôs email account got phished and was used to trick one of the company‚Äôs customers into sending a large payment to scammers. An investigation into the attacker‚Äôs infrastructure points to a long-running Nigerian cybercrime ring that is actively targeting established companies in the transportation and aviation industries. Image: Shutterstock, Mr. Teerapon Tiuekhom. A reader who works in the transportation industry sent a tip about a recent successful phishing campaign that tricked an executive at the company into entering their credentials at a fake Microsoft 365 login page. From there, the attackers quickly mined the executive‚Äôs inbox for past communications about invoices, copying and modifying some of those messages with new invoice demands that were sent to some of the company‚Äôs customers and partners. Speaking on condition of anonymity, the reader said the resulting phishing emails to customers came from a newly registered domai

title: Hiking the Border Panorama Trail - Where Austria Meets Slovenia | Hike the Line (1/3)
summary: Werner Herzog once said: ‚ÄûThe world reveals itself to those who travel on foot.‚Äú This proves even more true for those who wander along border trails ‚Äì broadening their horizon between two worlds. Follow us on some of the most beautiful and adventurous hiking trails in Europe‚Äôs...
fullContent: Werner Herzog once said: ‚ÄûThe world reveals itself to those who travel on foot.‚Äú This proves even more true for those who wander along border trails ‚Äì broadening their horizon between two worlds. Follow us on some of the most beautiful and adventurous hiking trails in Europe‚Äôs frontier regions. Become witness of the peaceful growing together of neighbours once divided by the Iron Curtain when we walk along the Borderland Panoramic Trail between Austria and Slovenia. Follow the historic Customs Officers‚Äô path along the entire coastline of Brittany to relive the eponyms‚Äô efforts to prevent smuggling and customs fraud. Or discover the unspoiled nature on the Upper Lusatian Mountain Trail in the borderland between Germany, Poland and the Czech Republic, where wolf packs have found a new home. ------- Chapters ‚ñ∑ 00:00 - Intro ‚ñ∑ 01:33 - H√ºhnerkogel ‚ñ∑ 04:50 - Jatschkifels ‚ñ∑ 05:40 - St. Urban ‚ñ∑ 06:42 - Zweibach Valley ‚ñ∑ 10:08 - Borderless Radio Communication ‚ñ∑ 11:58 - St. Pongratzen ‚ñ∑ 13:50 -
